page.title: 07Local Industries
page.content: There is really only one factory in Goring and that is Tayler Penn limited.Guilts of Goring is more of a ware house or distribution centre. Taylor Penn make pens and the factory is on the corner of Cleeve road.The building was the brewery and when it was in existance it sold its beer to all the pubs in Goring.The factory is quite big and it has lots of little windows.The pens are biros and other tipes of ink pens.Outside the Taylor Penn building is a cobbled drive and a big gate.Guilts of Goring is in Gatehampon and distribute drink to other places.The drink is beer and soft drinks.
